title: King Lear by William Shakespeare: an introduction
creator_credit: Education Foundation for Visual Arts, John Seabourne and Peter Seabourne
brief_description: Extracts from Act 1, Scene 1; Act 1, Scene 4; Act 2, Scene 4; Act 5, Scene 3 of Shakespeare’s play ‘King Lear’. In an accompanying handbook Sir Tyrone Guthrie considers the history of the play, Elizabethan theatre, Shakespeare’s company, and the historical background of the period.
